zhèngbiàn coup d'etat

traditional: 笑話
xiàohuà joke; jest

traditional: 生活資料
shēnghuózīliào living capital

traditional: 來回
láihuí to make a round trip; a return journey

traditional: 晉書
Jìnshū History of the Jin dynasty, fifth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史, compiled under Fang Xuanling 房玄齡 in 648 during Tang dynasty 唐朝, 130 scrolls

traditional: 改組
gǎizǔ to reorganize; to reshuffle (posts etc)

traditional: 惡劣
èliè vile; nasty; of very poor quality

traditional: 大權
dàquán power; authority

traditional: 城鄉
chéngxiāng city and countryside

traditional: 稱號
chēnghào (n) name; term of address; title
bàopò to blow up; to demolish (using explosives); dynamite; blast
zhōuqīxìng cyclicity
yǐngzi shadow; reflection
yàohǎo be on good terms; be close friends

traditional: 透視
tòushì to see through; perspective; to examine by fluoroscopy (i.e. X-ray)

traditional: 投機
tóujī be a speculator (profit seeking); congenial; agreeable; be opportunistic

traditional: 聽取
tīngqǔ hear (news); listen to

traditional: 侵蝕
qīnshí to erode; to corrode
límíng dawn; daybreak
